name: YouTube WideScreen Dark (OLD Design)  v.12
description: It's ONLY for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! .... NEW: Because sometime it fail to be enable, i have added (by default) the Dark and Gray Style from "YouTube Magic Action" Its an adaptation too for some addons or greaselonkey i use... Tested on Firefox / Waterfox only You can test too: Userstyle version: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) Or its Userscript version: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer)

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) - ByPass Sites Limitations Some example: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - YouTube: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) - Streaming : Stream - DuckDuckGo - Streaming Helper - Télévision: Télérama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray Note: Due to Userstyles.org limitation, some of my userstyles are minified (to reduce their size) by this online tool: CSS Minifier But now they are unreadable easily, sorry. You can watch their readable userstyle on Usertyles.World [USw] (or better use it!), because USw have not limit size when you post Many of my Userstyle are published on Userstyles.World [USw] too : Decembre [Userstyles.World [USw] It's a new site with a great accessibility and no limitation in size for the userstyle posted. I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : Decembre - My Favoris [GreasyFork] Just for info (deprecated): ★ MY ★ Installed ★ GM ★ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : Decembre Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: in GreasyFork. By example: - USERSTYLES - TABLES Sorter SIMPLE - Flickr - AUTO More Mini Thumbnail in Photo page Some my userstyles are published here too, by example: - Flickr WideScreen - BigONE I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait★Faces > Portrait★Faces★Open Minded

additional_info: ▶ To use it, You NEED keep the OLD YouTube ! You can use this Firefox Addon: YouTube Classic by Mirza Brunjadze OR You can use an "Addons Firefox/Mozilla Search: User-Agent": I test these one, they seems easy to use and working wel.: "User Agent Switcher" AND User-Agent Switcher and Manager I use this one with this configuration in in custom mode as shown below and it worked immediately: { "www.youtube.com": "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; Googlebot/2.1" } With this trick i regain the OLD YouTube interface and keep my YouTube addons and userscripts working on it. By example this one: - "YouTube - Restore Classic" or this one: - "Get me Old YouTube" MORE infos: How to get the OLD YouTube layout back! Working on chrome! (AND Firefox...) ▶ How to configure User Agent addon (resume: If the extensions and scripts aren't working for you, try this workaround : - Install a user-agent extension like User-Agent Switcher for Chrome or Firefox - Set your user agent to googlebot - Tick 'override domain' - Use the GreasyFork script 'Youtube Old Layout' or whatever you use for the usual disable_polymer=1 workaround. You can use 'Redirector' on Firefox because it allows to go back unlike the greasyfork scripts (?). - Set googlebot only on youtube: - Manage your extensions - Allow this extension to read and change all your data on websites you visit - On specific sites - youtube.com MORE Info: - Disable Polymer not working anymore: If the extensions and scripts aren't working for you, try this workaround ▶ An other way, not tested, find here: Here's how to revert back to the old Youtube Material Layout so the script can return to work .../... All you need to do is change the useragent to firefox 42 and youtube will revert to the old layout. about:config filter : general.useragent.override.youtube.com double-click and change to and : in Waterfox : Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Waterfox/56.3 in Pale Moon : Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 PaleMoon/28.10.0 .../... ▶ Test Link: Bonjour Tristesse #25 02.08.14 == Compatible with == ▶ ADDONs: - "YouTube Magic Action": - With Waterfox 57, curiously, the last version don't show the options page (empty pages). The quick solution, Install the previous version (Version 6.9.1.2 Released Oct 24, 2016) - With Quantum, the last version Work, but break some other scripts ( e.g. GM "Youtube Play Next Queue") and some part of this Userstyles (e.g. Blacklight view - i try to fix it) - "Video Pinner": Work only for Waterfox 57 (You can find it with the Addon ca-archive ( since v.12, it seems not need now..) ▶ Greasemonkey Userscripts : - [New]Youtube Play Next Queue - "YouTube Grid & Preview Player" (Deleted) : but you can copy paste code frome code in greasyfork or from my backup GM - YouTube Grid & Preview Player v.1.2.2 (last Version) - YouTube Video Preview and Ratings - Youtube Speed Control With + and - - "YouTube - Ctrl+": Search by second with CTRL > - "Auto show more for YouTube" : (Functions include in "YouTube Grid & Preview Player" ??) - The best Youtube Downloader, download video MP4, AVI, MP3, HD, 1080P, 2K, 4k & 8K: Utilize this online-tool DistillVideo ▶ GMs In TEST : - Youtube End-Screen Remover - YouTube + - "Bypass YouTube age verification Improved " : Deleted.... But you can test YouTube: Age Verification Bypass - YouTube Annotation Markers: see "YouTube Annotation Markers (GitHub)" - View Youtube videos by same user - Animated Youtube Thumbnails Updated - YouTube Thumbnails - Full Video Thumbnails for YouTube - Youtube Player Speed Slider or: Improved Speed Slider For YouTube ▶ Watch GeasyFork : My Set of Greasemonkey scripts for Youtube ▶ What's this userstyle does ? The Player: Pined at the top center with the addon: "Video Piner" Its Position is corrected by this Userstyle Panel Thumbnail: - Stay fixed to the left side) Discussions: Can be scrolled without lost the player. They don't jump on scroll. You can scroll one without move the other. When you scroll they become darker. You can highlight them on hover. ▶ Last Changes: v.12: - Rework to make the player Stay at its place without need an addons or an userscripts... - ADD note to HOW to KEEP OLD YOUTUBE and update Scripts list. - Add Dark and Gray style of "YouTube Magic Action"
